#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<string.h>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<map>
#include<math.h>
#include<algorithm>
#define LL long long
#define P(N) printf("%d\n",N);
#define S(N) scanf("%d",&N);
#define pb push_back
using namespace std;
static int factor(int num, int b)
{
    int ans=0;
    while(b*b<=num)
    {
        if(num%b==0)
            ans+= factor(num/b,b);
        b++;
    }
    return ans+1;
}
main()
{
    int t;

    int num;
    while(1)
    {
         scanf("%d",&num);
         if(num==0)
            break;
        cout<<(factor(num,2)-1)<<endl;
    }

return 0;
}
